# Next.js Portfolio Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a Next.js portfolio website with Tailwind CSS, optimized for Cloudflare Pages deployment and designed for 100/100 performance scores.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Cloudflare Pages
